description: Description: Exact deprojection of Sersic surface brightness profilesHomepage URL: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sersic/This is a well-tested implementation of the exact deprojection of the Sérsic surfacebrightness profiles as described in:"Analytical expressions for the deprojected Sérsic model"Baes and Gentile, Astronomy and Astrophysics, Volume 525:A136 (2011)http://arxiv.org/abs/1009.4713
title: sersic
